author: nick
msg: Following discussions on general@, update the guide to say that the project status page should hold the PPMC information, rather than an file no longer in SVN. Also include the PPMC information for Chemistry in their status page.

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Sascha Rodekamp " FTL error when feature description is missing" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3805) - OFBIZ-3805

author: gstein
msg: Implement the application of old-style propfiles against the database
during an upgrade process. (tho this code isn't really tested yet)
(prop_upgrade_trees): helper function to find the available trees,
WORKING presence, and WC_ID values for a props upgrade.
(svn_wc__db_op_set_props): assert abspath input. adjust logic to store a
WC_ID into the baton, rather than a PDH.
